entities.name: mclaggen
entities.description: Mentioned as taking a bat from Peakes and demonstrating how to hit a Bludger. (Harry spun round in midair. Sure enough, McLaggen, for reasons best known to himself, had pulled Peakes’s bat from him and appeared to be demonstrating how to hit a Bludger towards an oncoming Cadwallader.)
